rowprovider.param: SELECT gi_txtUDS ,convert(int,p.partnerid) _partnerid ,isnull (CONVERT(varchar, convert(int,p.partnerid)), 'UDS' + gi.[gi_txtUDS]) as pkey ,'2000' as[ry_lngReportingYear] ,'Clinic Director' as Role ,UPPER([gi_txtClinicalDirector]) gi_txtClinicalDirector ,SUBSTRING( REPLACE( REPLACE(UPPER([gi_txtClinicalDirector]),' ',''),'.','') ,1 ,6) as namekey ,[gi_txtClinicalDirectorPhone] ,[gi_txtClinicalDirectorEmail] from [HRSA_UDS_2000].[dbo].[tblGranteeInfo] gi left outer join InformationExplorer.dbo.Partner p on gi.[gi_txtUDS]=p.UDSGranteeID where [gi_txtClinicalDirector] is not null and LEN([gi_txtClinicalDirector]) > 0

select [gi_txtUDS] ,convert(int,p.partnerid) _partnerid ,isnull (CONVERT(varchar, convert(int,p.partnerid)), 'UDS' + gi.[gi_txtUDS]) as pkey ,'2001' as ry_lngReportingYear ,'Clinic Director' as Role ,UPPER([gi_txtClinicalDirector]) gi_txtClinicalDirector ,SUBSTRING( REPLACE( REPLACE(UPPER([gi_txtClinicalDirector]),' ',''),'.','') ,1 ,6) as namekey ,[gi_txtClinicalDirectorPhone] ,[gi_txtClinicalDirectorPhoneExt] ,[gi_txtClinicalDirectorEmail] from [HRSA_UDS_2001].[dbo].[tblGranteeInfo] gi left outer join InformationExplorer.dbo.Partner p on gi.[gi_txtUDS]=p.UDSGranteeID where [gi_txtClinicalDirector] is not null and LEN([gi_txtClinicalDirector]) > 0
